content.title: Maduro announces $6bn in Russian investments in Venezuela - EWN
content.desc: The Venezuelan strongman is in Moscow to whip up support from allies to prop up an economy in freefall.

content.title: Big pay rise means little in hapless Venezuela - TimesLIVE
content.desc: Venezuela has suffered from economic woes since 2014, when a crash in the price of crude oil prompted a crisis.
